title: Shredded Brussels Sprouts With Shitake Mushrooms
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Shredded Brussels Sprouts With Shitake Mushrooms a try. One serving contains 110 calories, 6g of protein, and 5g of fat. This gluten free, dairy free, and whole 30 recipe serves 4 and costs $1.35 per serving. 14 people have made this recipe and would make it again. A mixture of mushroom broth, trader joe's fried onions optional, olive oil, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 12 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 97%. This score is outstanding. Try Shredded Brussels Sprouts Saut√©, Shredded Brussels Sprouts Salad, and Mediterranean Shredded Brussels Sprouts for similar recipes.
